item.title: How Beetlejuice 2 Filmed Deloresâ€™ Resurrection Sequence
item.description: A Beetlejuice 2 special feature explains how Tim Burton filmed Delores' resurrection sequence and involves methods from Wednesday's Thing.

item.title: Dave Bautista's New Action Movie Is A Career Low Point After 18 Years
item.description: Dave Bautista has a fairly reliable track record at the box office, but his new action movie The Killer's Game is a career low in that way.

item.title: Director Edgar Wright & Scott Pilgrim Star Reuniting After 14 Years In New Stephen King Remake
item.description: Fourteen years after the release of Scott Pilgrim Vs. The World, Michael Cera and director Edgar Wright reunite for Stephen King's The Running Man.
